content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code summertime50 for 50% off the original price or use the code summertime100 for a free copy thank you for your support the summertime sadness coaster is a charming crochet project that captures the bittersweet beauty of summer s end featuring a combination of basic stitches this coaster is perfect for beginners looking to add a little flair to their skills the design incorporates a cozy ribbed edging for texture while the middle showcases an elegant airy mesh pattern that adds a touch of sophistication whether you re sipping iced tea or enjoying a cozy moment indoors this coaster adds a delicate handcrafted touch to any space simple yet stylish the summertime sadness coaster is the perfect way to preserve those fleeting summer vibes this pattern is made in dk weight yarn with a 4 5mm hook i think a synthetic or plant fiber is best for a coaster as you will want it to be easy care this coaster is worked in the round in double_crochet half_double_crochet and single_crochet stitch you work increases every round to get it to the proper size while adding a few decorative touches throughout the piece gauge is not crucial in such a small piece this pattern is written for one size which should be a perfect fit for most mugs if you find that it is too small/too large for your mug i encourage you to experiment with another gauge or the number of rounds this is a beginner friendly pattern it uses basic stitches and there are also links to video tutorials for all the special techniques thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support thank you to my testers jooleej /people/jooleej lilabuczynski
